p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day

problem.p: Nov 9/10 W10D2 Conservation of Angular Momentum; Experiment 6: Angular Momentum Reading Assignment: Young and Freedman: 10.5-10.6;
(1) Under what circumstances is the angular momentum of a system about some point constant or non-constant?
(2) When a cat falls and makes a complete turn in the air (see figure 10.28), is the cat violating the principle of conservation of angular momentum? Explain your answer.
